org.expressme.webwind.renderer
Class TextRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.expressme.webwind.renderer.Renderer
      org.expressme.webwind.renderer.TextRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaScriptRenderer
public class TextRenderer
extends Renderer

Render http response as text. This is usually used to render HTML, JavaScript, CSS or any text type.

Author:
Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com)
